com.lambdaworks.redis

Interface BaseRedisConnection<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - Key type.
    V - Value type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RedisAdvancedClusterCommands<K,V>, RedisAdvancedClusterConnection<K,V>, RedisClusterCommands<K,V>, RedisClusterConnection<K,V>, RedisCommands<K,V>, RedisConnection<K,V>, RedisPubSubCommands<K,V>
    Deprecated. 
    Use BaseRedisCommands

    @Deprecated
public interface BaseRedisConnection<K,V>
extends Closeable
    Basic synchronous executed commands.
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Mark Paluch

    • Method Detail

      • publish

        Long publish(K channel,
             V message)
        Deprecated. 
        Post a message to a channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel type: key
        message - the message type: value
        Returns:
        Long integer-reply the number of clients that received the message.

      • pubsubChannels

        List<K> pubsubChannels()
        Deprecated. 
        Lists the currently *active channels*.
        Returns:
        List<K> array-reply a list of active channels, optionally matching the specified pattern.

      • pubsubChannels

        List<K> pubsubChannels(K channel)
        Deprecated. 
        Lists the currently *active channels*.
        Parameters:
        channel - the key
        Returns:
        List<K> array-reply a list of active channels, optionally matching the specified pattern.

      • pubsubNumsub

        Map<K,Long> pubsubNumsub(K... channels)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the number of subscribers (not counting clients subscribed to patterns) for the specified channels.
        Parameters:
        channels - channel keys
        Returns:
        array-reply a list of channels and number of subscribers for every channel.

      • pubsubNumpat

        Long pubsubNumpat()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the number of subscriptions to patterns.
        Returns:
        Long integer-reply the number of patterns all the clients are subscribed to.

      • echo

        V echo(V msg)
        Deprecated. 
        Echo the given string.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message type: value
        Returns:
        V bulk-string-reply

      • role

        List<Object> role()
        Deprecated. 
        Return the role of the instance in the context of replication.
        Returns:
        List<Object> array-reply where the first element is one of master, slave, sentinel and the additional elements are role-specific.

      • ping

        String ping()
        Deprecated. 
        Ping the server.
        Returns:
        String simple-string-reply

      • readOnly

        String readOnly()
        Deprecated. 
        Switch connection to Read-Only mode when connecting to a cluster.
        Returns:
        String simple-string-reply.

      • readWrite

        String readWrite()
        Deprecated. 
        Switch connection to Read-Write mode (default) when connecting to a cluster.
        Returns:
        String simple-string-reply.

      • quit

        String quit()
        Deprecated. 
        Close the connection.
        Returns:
        String simple-string-reply always OK.

        Deprecated.

        Returns:

        Long waitForReplication(int replicas,

        Parameters:

      • dispatch

        <T> T dispatch(ProtocolKeyword type,
               CommandOutput<K,V,T> output)
        Deprecated. 
        Dispatch a command to the Redis Server. Please note the command output type must fit to the command response.
        Type Parameters:
        T - response type
        Parameters:
        type - the command, must not be null.
        output - the command output, must not be null.
        Returns:
        the command response

      • dispatch

        <T> T dispatch(ProtocolKeyword type,
               CommandOutput<K,V,T> output,
               CommandArgs<K,V> args)
        Deprecated. 
        Dispatch a command to the Redis Server. Please note the command output type must fit to the command response.
        Type Parameters:
        T - response type
        Parameters:
        type - the command, must not be null.
        output - the command output, must not be null.
        args - the command arguments, must not be null.
        Returns:
        the command response

        void close()
        Deprecated. 
        Close the connection. The connection will become not usable anymore as soon as this method was called.

        Deprecated.
